TopicTitle: What monster do you want to see in the sequel to Godzilla 2014?

Articles.Content:
Despite what people may say, I thought Godzilla 2014 was an incredible movie. There's already talk of a sequel, so I thought I'd expand the discussion of what monster or monsters people want to see Godzilla fight.

Here's a list of monsters I'd like to see, most wanted to least wanted:

Biollante

Megaguirus

Rodan

Another new monster (some kind of lava monster or sea monster, perhaps?)

Ghidorah

Orga

It might be interesting to have Godzilla and two other monsters fight in a three-sided battle, like Godzilla vs Rodan vs another MUTO.

Discuss!

P.S. - Ghidorah is technically not a dragon, but is, in fact, a wyvern, due to the fact that he has no forearms. Random mythical creature fact.

Edited July 12, 2014 by JMBuilder
A giant kerbal. If they don't do one, I'll not see the movie.

Optimus Prime.

You think I'm joking too, huh? It wouldn't take much. Give me a few beers, some cash and a ten-minute conversation with Michael Bay and I'll get something whipped up.
I want to see Godzilla for sure...

I had a thought. Since Warner Brothers is one of the companies that now owns Godzilla, it gave be an idea. Warner brothers also made the movie The Iron Giant.

Godzilla vs The Iron Giant?
I totally want to see the infamous Dogzilla battling against our dear Godzilla in the next film!
